definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3

definition: Shenzhen Stock Exchange, abbr. to 深交所[Shen1 Jiao1 suo3]
pinyin: Shen1 zhen4 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3

definition: sum or volume of business transactions/turnover

pinyin: Niu3 yue1 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3
Mei3 guo2 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
Bei3 jing1 chan3 quan2 jiao1 yi4 suo3

sentences.english: He transacts business with a large number of stores.
sentences.chinese: 他與很多商店進行交易。

sentences.english: This is a foreign exchange trader direct experience.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個外匯交易的直接經驗。

sentences.english: This past offseason there were tons of reports circulating around Kobe Bryant's wish to be traded.
sentences.chinese: 過去的那個休賽期，有很多關於科比想被交易的報道。

sentences.english: Most global transactions are carried out by a letter of credit (LC).
sentences.chinese: 大多數全球交易都是通過信用證白勺方式完成。

sentences.english: But Love does not traffic in a marketplace, nor use a huckster's scales.
sentences.chinese: 但愛不在市場上交易，也不用小販的秤來稱量。

sentences.english: What are the currency pairs and time frames that BURU trades on?
sentences.chinese: BURU交易時間圖表以及貨幣對是什麼？

sentences.english: It is impossible that markets are in the same market.
sentences.chinese: 交易所記帳式債券也能在股市裏買。

sentences.english: The proceeds as generated from any rule-breaking trading shall be dealt with pursuant to the relevant regulations.
sentences.chinese: 在違規交易中所獲利益，依照有關規定處理。

sentences.english: It was designed as "a real-world, highly sophisticated trading atmosphere."
sentences.chinese: 那是“真實複雜的交易氛圍。”

sentences.english: Our trade terms are the same as the stipulations in the S/C No. 101.
sentences.chinese: 其他交易條件與101號銷售確認書中的規定相同。

sentences.english: Forecasting the market-clearing price (MCP) is the most essential task for any decision-making in electricity market.
sentences.chinese: 市場清算電價預測是電力市場中交易決策的基礎。

sentences.english: This time, however, Chinese authorities in Hebei Province stepped forward and stopped the deal.
sentences.chinese: 但這一次，河北省的地方政府插手並阻止了這一交易。

sentences.english: From thenceforward that bargain struck in child's play made me a free man.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，在孩子的遊戲中我們做成了交易，這。

sentences.english: These hospitals are required to install the hardware and software to process smart-card transactions.
sentences.chinese: 要求這些醫院安裝處理智能卡交易的硬件和軟件。

definition: to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag
to transfer to another club (professional sports)
